column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

アイゼンベルグに
オートマンの軍団が
あらわれたらしい。
column5: I've had word an army of Automen have appeared in Eisenberg.
column11: It looks like an army of Automen have appeared in Eisenberg.

column4:
今、軍と傭兵部隊が
力を合わせて防衛線を
はっている。
column5: Currently, the military and mercenary soldiers have joined forces to tighten defenses.
column11: Currently, the military and mercenary soldiers have joined forces to tighten defences.

column4:
激しい戦闘が
続いているようだ。
column5: An intense battle is still raging.
column11: And their intense fight is still ongoing.

column4:
どうやら
クロノタウンを襲ったのは
軍勢の一部にすぎんようだな。
column5: It seems the troops that attacked Chrono Town were only one part of their army.
column11: It seems the troops who attacked Chrono Town were only one part of their army.

column4: メリッサ＿戦闘中電話機で通話

オートマンの増援部隊が
街道を進軍中。
column5: A unit of Automan reinforcements are marching on the highway.
column11: A unit of Automen reinforcements are marching on the highway.

column4:
このままじゃ
アイゼンベルグは全滅だよ。
column5: If this keeps up, Eisenberg will be wiped off the map.
column11: If this keeps up, Eisenberg will be wiped off the map.

column4:
アイゼンベルグを
集中攻撃する気なんだ。
column5: They must be trying to focus their attack on Eisenberg.
column11: They must be trying to focus their attack on Eisenberg.

column4:
まだ間に合う。
そいつらをやっつけよう。
column5:
It's not too late.
We can get to them first.
column11:
It's not too late.
We can get to them first.

column5: That's one heck of an army.
column11: That's one heck of an army.

column4:
/p！
こいつらをアイゼンベルグへ
行かせるな！
column5:
/p!
Don't let them make their way to Eisenberg!
column11:
/p!
Don't let them make their way to Eisenberg!

大型ビッグフェイス注２
